sentences.sentence: Clean, unique and topically relevant site designs will always help.
sentences.translation: 清洁，独特的和局部相关网站的设计将永远帮助。

sentences.sentence: So far, there are no studies showing any increased risk to humans using the drug topically.
sentences.translation: 到目前为止，没有任何研究显示任何风险增加对人类使用外用药物。

sentences.sentence: When applied topically, this antioxidant-rich fruit may help skin create more collagen, while speeding healing.
sentences.translation: 局部使用时，这种富含抗氧化剂的水果可以帮助皮肤产生更多的胶原，以加快愈合速度。
